New Records: Coby White set a new career-high with 9 three-pointers made
Key Match Events: Zach LaVine and Coby White combined for 35 points in the first half
The Bulls dominated the third quarter with a 41-17 advantage
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls felt like they were playing for a win, despite the high-scoring nature of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a crowd-pleaser with a 139-126 final score
The halftime ceremony was a 25-minute-long tribute to Derrick Rose
Others: The Bulls' performance was a season-high-scoring effort
